text: If we did text only then people will just start UUencoding/MIME encoding text messages a la usenet/email. <https://dattnetwork.slack.com/archives/storage/p1438663120000026>

attachments.fallback: [August 3rd, 2015 9:38 PM] genevayngrib: <@U08ERPTQF>: I thought the decision was made to only store the textual data, so it is much less of an issue. I understand that people can still use all of sorts of encoding for images.
attachments.text: <@U08ERPTQF>: I thought the decision was made to only store the textual data, so it is much less of an issue. I understand that people can still use all of sorts of encoding for images.

text: Intentionally hobbling the technology will only hinder it's adoption, not it's capability
Researching this stuff makes me want to go get a masters in Mathematics so I can brush up on my algebraic structures
They never taught groups, rings, lattices, or modules for my undergrad degree ;_;
